FuncDef: This command configures the context to configure egress or ingress queue parameters. Parameters defined in theconfig>qos>sap-egresspolicy-idor theconfig>qos>sap-ingresspolicy-idcontext are overridden by parameters specified in the subscriber management SLA profile context.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the queue ID for the SAP egress or ingress queue, expressed as a decimal integer. The ID uniquely identifies the queue within the profile. Values-1 to 0.
